experience.title: Founder Director
experience.description: Blue Iris is a boutique investment bank focused on real estate and corporate debt syndication.We consult real estate developers in raising finance through structured products,HNI investments, banks, and other financial institutions. We also actively deal in pre-leased,pre-launch,and high end residential projects. For affordable housing projects, we arrange finance through bulk bookings by HNI investors. Under corporate debt syndication vertical, we consult small and medium enterprises in raising debt from banks/financial institutions. We have excellent working relationships with leading public /private sector banks as well as with NBFCs in India. We have capability to arrange debt up to Rs 250 crore on our own in the form of term loans, working capital loans, loan against property/shares,and unsecured loans.We have offices in Mumbai, Bangalore, and Nashik.
